snippet: YONKOVIG--Babs. (1948-2016), of New York City and Palm Beach. Leaves behind her loving husband, Zen, who gave her hope and made her smile until the end, and her many caring family members and friends. Services are private. For those who would like to make a donation in her honor, (in lieu of flowers), Babs family has chosen Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center, Dr. Raajit Rampal, Leukemia Group. http://giving.mskcc.org/ ways-give 1/3
